caption: Super good and friendly 👌
Awesome store with awesome folks. Great conversation... thank you ill be back again.
Awesome selection, great prices! Must stop in here
This is a warm inviting environment. Staff is on point and is ready to help you nail down your needs. Came in for my brother's flavor, a sour apple fun dip and was not disappointed. Peace!
Excellent customer service and product.

Found this place in a moment of desperation. Anyone knocking CVS is either insane or just a hater. The staff and environment is chill and inviting. If they don’t have it they can/will most likely order it. I’ve been in 3 times since finding it and it’s the same “cheers” vibe every time.  Keep up the good work all and stand up as proud successful business operators/owners. YOU are the life blood of this country.
Just got an email that they're offering pick-up and delivery. Glad to know that's an option when I need to purchase again.

Cool vape shop in city. Prices are competitive to the location...real cool taste/vape juice sample before buying which is cool. Or just chill and vape with the staff. Def. Will visit again when in the city.
Awesome staff helped me out grateful because I was from out of town and I had a system that they didn't have but the guy at the counter found me a solution best shop in DC that I found
Great product availability, prices, and friendly service. Solid all around!
hate it
Great service and fair prices. Thanks!
Best vape shop in DC

I’ll rate them a 2 for customer service.....other than that this place is extremely more expensive than other locations, I’m assuming because of the area it’s located. They charge $30+ and some are $40+ for vape liquids which is insane! I highly recommend going to Vape Exchange in college park Maryland, their vape juices are $10-$15 cheaper and their coils are a lot cheaper as well.
Great guys, very helpful.
Very friendly ,helpful & professional staff  the flavor also very perfect
Great service and great area to just vape out
First time here today. Great, easy, and fast experience. Very neat and organized store. Would recommend to a friend.
Great place a little pricey
Awesome, I was well educated in use and prices of batteries. It was clean, friendly , and will be back

I literally called to find out some information and the guy who answered the phone rudely hung up on me. When I called back the guy had a nasty tone and hung up again. I hope you guys close down, what horrible customer service. #wontspendmoneyhere
Definitely go see these guys! Very friendly and helpful staff and they have a huge selection of house juice. I was very happy to find them while in DC!
Everyone was very helpful and kind! Great products,great service! Will definitely be back next time in DC
Probably most knowledgeable staff owner is extremely helpful and honest.  Definately a winner

username: Robin Walker Salas wounded warriors BEHIND BARS

caption: Very friendly staff! Cool as heck, very engaging in conversation. Not a huge selection, but they have variety for sure, you are likely to find something you like.
Best cape shop in DC in my opinion, these guys a knowledgeable and fun to be around. I recommend this being your first stop if interested in giving up cigarettes.  Tofu
The people are very knowledgeable, if you need a new kit you could do a lot worse.
Very knowledgeable and helpful
Geoffrey was amazing man!!! He helped me get a new flavor and coil gave me the best advice!! Love this place the whole team is always so friendly, professional, and helpful.
Cool, helpful staff.
Great customer service very knowledgeable about their products and took time to explain and setup everything... Jeff was Stellar.

Any and everything related to vaping can be handled by the very knowledgeable staff at this laid back friendly neighborhood store. I am on my second unit and it is exactly what I wanted. I told Jeff what I wanted and nailed it giving me a Vaporesso cascade one. Thanks again Jeff! 🙏🤚👐🙌🤲 ( a bunch of hi-5's)

Bought a vape from another store end up breaking the glass that same day! Made my way down CVS and they were LIFE SAVER'S !!! The service was AWESOME will definitely be coming back to shop all things vape.THANKS AGAIN GUYS!👍✌️

If you need vape supplies, this should be your only stop in DC. I went for years while I lived in the city, and they always had the best prices, and the most expertise of anywhere i went. For me, it came down to whether I wanted to watch a 30 min YouTube video, or just ask the people at Capitol Vape Supply - not once did they not know the answer to any question I had. I love these guys, and still go in every time I am back in the city.
Staff is awesome and very helpful, I always come when I'm in dc,

Best vape shop in dc.  Their house juice "blue fluff" is my favorite juice and it's a great price.  I smoked for 20 years and have finally kicked the habit by vaping.  I tried everything. Capital vape supply is top notch and I recommend them to anyone looking to stop smoking or are just interested in vaping.  Thanks guys  ** Edited to add** Capital vape supply now delivers. As somone who is disabled and has trouble getting to the shop this is so awesome. Got my first delivery today and it was perfect. Check these guys out for sure.
Super.... they know their stuff.
Great selection and chill people.
Knowledgeable and friendly.

My experience at CVS was awesome. Something happened with a vaporizer that I bought there (the issue was my fault), and they made it right, on the spot. The people working there were extremely awesome. My girlfriend bought replacement coils for her vape, and they cleaned her tank out and installed the coil. Very friendly, chill and awesome people. I'll definitely be coming back to this spot!!!
Great feel. Great help. Not bad prices. I find them to be a great place for all your vape needs.

Always a circus on U street.. but always a safe haven for me. I love this shop and the people in it. I’m Unable to come through as often as I’d like these days however, These guys not only got me to quit smoking, but have always given me  the best customer service I could ask for .. and more. The best selection of juices in Dc hands down. This place is the real deal. People who actually know their craft and don’t bs you. Much love.

Very rude employees who felt like it was a hassle to serve me. I was only in the store for no more than 5 minutes before I realised that I was not being treated fairly. When I asked the employee a question they told me to "look around" and asked if I had a mental problem. One of them began to shout at me when I asked for him to repeat what he said because I couldn't hear him. Overall this store is filled with bad employees who will treat you very rude.

visiting from the Uk , popped in for a look see , great little vape shop , great advice on cbd , cant remember the name of the guy that served me but he was great , just trying the cbd now , thanks for a bang on vape shop experience the way it should be , best vape shop I've been in while in DC.
Very knowledgeable staff. Good prices. Good folks
This place is amazing!!!!as soon as i walked in i was greeted and the service was amazing !!!!Dylan and Cal were very knowledgable of each product!! I will be returning soon!!
Guys here are super nice and helpful. Their house juices are pretty good at a reasonable price

Great customer service they are knowledgeable of there trade and will answer your questions with confidence.  Prices are mid-range and the selection is various.  All in all, I gave it five for a reason.
Small selection of hardware and medium sized selection of juices, but high prices.

between the crazy lit stock they have and how late they stay open, the best thing about this spot is how great the customer service is. I went in got great expertise and great conversation. Best place in the city hands down!!

The owner is continuing to lie in his response to my review which is unfortunate. I think he's hoping I delete it, but I won't. I'd never threaten or cause a scene and I'm sorry he feels the need to lie in his response to protect his business. I've already ordered the item online and hope this business does well, but the owner should learn how to represent his business and team better.  To ensure potential customer satisfaction you should record contact details to follow up with the person. That's the lesson here I understand you're upset, but please stop stating things that did not take place, it's just wrong. And you should know that. I will continue to check and edit so this review stays recent if you don't stop lying about my actions and behavior because you know people can't verify what you're saying. One bad review ain't that big of a deal, but I take attacks on my character seriously. I will stop once I see that you're no longer insisting that I acted disrespectfully, because that is not in my character and it makes me extremely uncomfortable to know you're continuing to claim it. I feel like it's lowkey racist bc you see I'm Black and think people will believe you, which is another reason why I go through great pains to treat everyone well (you responding with your race card, makes this more disappointing). That's why I edited my original review for accuracy. But I'm not lying and I wasn't beyond inappropriate in the shop. I have to protect my name just like you're tryna protect your shops name, only difference is I reached out twice and no one on the other end followed up and no one told me to check before coming in. There's fault on both sides, but you need to chill.  I'm sure this place is great, because they have hella good reviews. But I called the store on Tuesday asking if they'd have pax 3 chargers and they told me to come in on Thursday (today) after 5pm because that's when they expected them. I messaged them today and asked if they were still expecting them and I was told they were. When I arrived and asked about it, the two behind the counter barely looked as because they didn't receive them. Then after I pressed, one went upstairs to look, still nothing and said I probably talked to someone else (who turned out to be the owner). I gave a negative review because I felt intentionally mislead to avoid me purchasing it online (tryna help out local business) and despite them knowing how to contact me, no one followed up to say they haven't arrived before I biked over. I'm editing this review because the owner proceeded to follow up, in the rudest way possible and harass me through message for 15 mins, saying that they're sorry I had my mom drive me over (what happened to professionalism?). As you can see from the owners reply before, the item is not being sold by the manufacturer, so I'm not sure why I was told to come in in the first place. Just follow up when you should, I reached out twice and don't understand why it's all on the customer after I received more than one assurance. But I guess that's business...
Excellent customer service - Capital Vape goes the extra mile.  There’s a very knowledgeable team and excellent selection of products
Great atmosphere , helpful staff , and amazing selection of juice . It's the only vape shop I like to go too now due to the service . Would recommend for sure .

Best vape shop in DC. These were the guys who helped me transition from cigarettes to vape in the first place (forever grateful for that). The staff is so knowledgeable about their products and really take their time to find the right product for you. They offer a wide variety of juices too; there is always something new to try which is fun, so you're bound to find something that you love . Make this your first and only stop for your vape needs!!!
Have seen better
They acted like it was a inconvenience when we arrived,saw lots of cool stuff,but I don't like the attitude and I felt like they didn't even want to be bothered by me
Meh, small vape shop, interesting stock though. Definitely some brands and flavors I haven’t seen. Friendly staff
People are very nice and are very knowledgeable about anything in the store.
Loved it
Helpful staff. Great prices. Very unique selection of vapor. They carry great brands. Tons of different options to chose from. Will be back very soon.
Great selection, knowledgeable staff, I love this place.
Great staff
Props to Cal for getting me set up with a vape and for knowing his stuff backwards and forwards!!! <3
Great spot, knowledgeable staff, competitive prices, wide selection of kits, mods, and juice. Worth a visit!

Drove over 30 minutes to get there guys ignored us at the door even tho they should've been open for the next 20 minutes we called and the guy at the desk ignored us and hung the phone infront of us. I'll be taking my rack I was gonna bust on y'all else where.
Friendly, patient and very helpful
Good selection of E Juice.  The house brand juices are good quality, and reasonably priced.
Good selection of juices, mods, and tanks.  Helpful staff
Extremely helpful staff!!! Taught me everything I needed to know about building coils and RTA's. They're also open late!!
Excellent shop. Came from Jacksonville on vacation and needed some supplies and they hooked me up.
Excellent.
Atmosphere is great. Everyone in here is knowledgeable and can answer any questions  you may have and do so in a professional and welcoming way.

My pen that I normally use stopped working and so I found myself googling shops in DC. Up turns Capitol Vape Supply. I went over, in rush hour, to get some help. These guys were true pros and very patient with me. I'm relatively new to vaping and had a lot of questions and they took the time to answer, educate, and show me how to use what I purchased. Oh! And that was easy too. As someone who didn't really know what they were looking for but knew how much I wanted to spend, these guys were able to give me options in like 2 minutes. I would definitely recommend and will personally be going back for my vape needs.
Great store!  I work in the vape industry and this store was doing it right for sure
Excellent Customer Service from a very knowledgeable staff!!!! Also they have a wide selection of e juice, mods, tanks, rta's, rda's, batteries, and chargers!!!!
200+ JUICE FLAVORS @ good prices. Professional, friendly staff will get you and keep you vaping rite! Their house menthol is the only thing you’ll find in my vape!

I purchased a vape from here a few weeks ago. Changed the coil and discovered the threading connecting the tank to the mod was defective. Took it to the store to see if it could be repaired or replaced. They refused to do either. Told me to contact the manufacturer and completely refused to assist in any way. I used to be a regular customer here. Never again. If you don't stand behind your products, you don't deserve to be in business.
Very good customer service!

Holy Sweet Nipples, for real try sweet nipples by vapegoons my favorite juice sold here. The staff is great, knowledgeable, and interested in you as a person. The nicotine pump was amazing for getting to 0 nic. I started on a 3 then 2 then 1 and now I'm at 0. I've haven't found this anywhere else in the area.  I tend to come for the juice and stay for the conversation. It's both a great place to get your vaping needs and a good place to chat as you try out your new juice in your personal vape. I'm constantly recommending this shop and finally decided to leave a review

Let me start by saying I am a hardcore vapor. 6 years of experience, so I know a thing, or two. This place ranks at the very bottom of vape shops in the district, as far as knowledge, customer service, and selection. I popped by one afternoon, and awkwardly stood by for about 5 mins before I was acknowledged, forget greeted lol. They had a few basic devices " nothing top shelf " and I was puzzled to find out all the juice had zero nicotine. I purchased a 30ml bottle of Ripe Vapes VCT, and the lady helping me said they could go in the back, and "put nicotine in it". Long story short I bought the bottle, and couldn't even bring myself to vape it. What a waste, one visit to this establishment was one to many for me.

The purchase is quick and easy. Staff is chilled and knowledgeable. I actually get 1 bottle that cost 2/3 of the regular price because its on discount. They also have house made juice, probably gonna try next time. It was a pleasant shopping experience.

Reading most of these reviews didn't match my experiences at all. They all sound similar too like an employee may be writing the fake reviews. The reason I'm not going back is because I've visited the store about 5 times and 4 of the 5 times they act like it's a bother that I stopped into the store. I got help (reluctantly) by a guy working there. He didn't know the brand of the product he was trying to sell me. He acted as if that was my only option. Once I asked for similar products, he took another out and just set it there. I'm not an expert on vaping, but I do know a little about customer service and this place is lacking big time. No way I would buy something from them when I am treated like this and when I leave the store without getting my questions answered.  It's closer to home, but I'll find somewhere else to go.

I don't know what the others mean by bad customer service, this place was great. They are a friendly bunch and very knowledgeable. I was even given a sample bottle to try out. The selection is fantastic and prices are better than any other vape store near D.C.  I have been to many, many vape stores before and will say this place is easily my favourite.  Don't listen to haters and try this place out - you won't be disappointed

Knowledgeable staff, friendly atmosphere.  You can vape inside.  Staff makes all the difference... I have thrown 1000 questions at them and they know all the answers and can make great recommendations. Definitely makes brick and mortar shops like this one worth it over online purchasing.

Seem like nice guys, just doesn't seem to be much of a standard for service. No biggy. Overpriced yes; but it's not really fair to compare independent B/M prices to internet prices. Biggest issue is the nicotine. They get all their juices with 0 nic and then they add it themselves in the back of the store. Shady at best, possibly illegal. No way for the customer to know what's going on back there. Not to mention that since the bottles come to them full, they'd surely have to empty some of the juice out in order to add the nicotine, so you end up with less than you paid for. Every time I've gone there my juice has come back way too harsh for the levels I ask for. I'm no newbie, I know what it should taste like. If I'm going to treat myself to expensive juice once in a while, I should receive what I ask for. Sorry guys, you're out of chances.
Visiting from out of town, found Capital vape.  They are awesome helped me out in a jam.  Thanks
employees were rude and not helpful. I came in to learn about what they had and send money. they clearly could not be bothered with speaking with me.
Great place and knowledgeable staff
Good service - decent selection
Love it, great service and selection of juices
I RARELY go in a vape store, ask for a VERY specific flavor and get it. These people know how to vape. I could get it in virtually any nic and they have a plethora of flavors. Definitely coming back.
Great staff. Sold me something that suited my needs without trying to upsell
The best services
Great crew, good selection.
These guys know their stuff. Very reasonable prices.
Good guys. Fair prices. Huge variety. Give em a peep!
chill place w/ cool and knowledgeable staff. always friendly and always got what i need.
Good selection
Awesome & knowledge staff. Very friendly environment. Great selection & convenient location. DC's best by far!
My go to spot for all my vape equipment  and supplies.  Top flight customer service with real dudes that show love. Everyone that works there is personable!

Long-time smoker - 15 years.  Time to move on, although I'm hesitant.  Went to Capital Vape.  They were great.  Knowledgeable, patient with all my questions, also have "transitioned" away from cigs, so were able to talk about the experience.  Highly recommend this place.  Cool guys, great shopping experience.
Super friendly and knowledgeable staff, huge selection of testers. Open late.
Cool atmosphere, helpful and knowledgeable staff, GREAT juices and low prices! Best of the best in the city, going there now to grab a few necessities.

I called this shop and I spoke to Dylan, I must implement the level of customer service is world class. Dylan never forced or pushed me away by saying "I'm not getting paid for time losing on answering your questions" or "I'm busy, please call back" or "You ask too many questions, why don't you google it" he was willing to give me the time to understand about different selection of Vape liquids and different Vape modules they offered; while other Vape shops were pushy or didn't answer my questions or hung up on me. I asked a lot of questions over the phone and gotten brief but complete answers. He described the differences of different Vape juices and recommended some as well. Told me the prices and was very knowledgeable and open to giving me information. I visited the shop and the employees there were friendly and chill. I enjoyed my time there. Thanks so much for making me feel comfortable.
Enjoyed my first visit to the shop. Looking to make many more. It was inviting and calm when I walked in the door. Friendly staff and knowledgeable.

best vape shop I've ever been to..... I have been buying over priced E-liquids until i came across this place the line of e-liquids that they sale are great and very affordable.. will be pushing all my friends that vape to this shop
Been vaping four years and this is the best shop I've been to. Awesome staff and great house juices.
Excellent customer service and tons of product. Great variety of juices and grear knowledge of their product

This is the place right here. Everything you could want in such a place—assuming you're like me and appreciate tons of juice, coils in stock, and friendly, real people on staff ready to help without doing any alienating. I hope they stay around for as long as vaping does.

Walked in a novice, the guys in there were very helpful and didn't try to sell me anything I wasn't looking for. It is a pain in the neck for me to get over there, but I will definitely be going back. Very knowledgeable and friendly worth the trip.

Visited from NYC a month or two back. The store's overall vibe was chill and the owners/employees were so nice and extremely knowledgable. They had lots of insight into vape supplies and mod building. Ended up buying my own vape (boyfriend was shopping for local DC juice, which tasted amazing for an affordable price) and they tested and set it all up for me. Thank you Capital Vape! Will def visit again during another weekend getaway!
Came in for the first time and the employees put me on to the right vape and has really helped me quit smoking. I recommend these guys to everyone they help everyone's needs.
Perfect place to find some affordable eliquids!
Best vape shop in the City!
Best vape shop in the DMV awesome staff very welcoming makes you feel like your at your friends house and not a store
I love this ship I'm not from DC but the hours of operation blow any shop up by me away plus they are very friendly and welcoming to me
Friendly vape shop, probably the best I've been to in DC.
